figure_1: Proportions of tweets are given as those posted by statin users (user), those posted about someone they knew taking statins (other’s use), health care professionals, inconclusive identification (inconclusive), and non–health related.
figure_2: Persons posting tweets include those posted by statin users (user), those posted about someone they knew taking statins (other’s use), health care professionals, and inconclusive identification (inconclusive). ADR indicates adverse drug reaction. Values in the color bar and circle sizes indicate numbers of persons posting.
